description: The BCCI has barred cryptocurrency and real money gaming firms from bidding for the Indian cricket team’s lead sponsorship rights. The decision reflects increasing regulatory scrutiny of crypto promotions in India, with SEBI previously targeting misleading celebrity endorsements. The move marks a significant setback for crypto adoption, cutting off one of India’s most visible marketing avenues. Industry watchers say the decision could further limit mainstream acceptance of digital assets in the country.
title: BCCI Says Crypto, Real Money Gaming Platforms Can’t Bid for Team India’s Title Sponsorship

description: For decades, geologists believed the Himalayas were built on a double layer of continental crust. New research overturns that view, revealing that a dense slab of mantle rock actually wedges between India’s and Asia’s crusts beneath the range. This “mantle sandwich” better explains seismic data and how the mountains remain so stable while rising by about 1 cm each year.
title: Scientists Discover Hidden Mantle Layer Beneath the Himalayas Challenging Century-Old Theory

description: Su From So is a Kannada-language horror-comedy movie that stars JP Thuminad in the lead role. The film will be released on September 5 on JioHotstar. It is an epic horror comedy that is set in the coastal village of Marlur. The movie has epic comic sequences accompanied by supernatural events and is a complete family entertainer.
title: Su From So OTT Release: When and Where to Watch This Kannada-Language Horror-Comedy Online

description: The Fall Guy is finally landing on Netflix, a year after its theatrical release. Viewers will require an active subscription to the streaming service. The movie is a comedy-drama that stars Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt in the lead roles. It is highly engaging and a complete entertainer.
title: The Fall Guy OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch This Ryan Gosling Action Film Online

description: Astronomers are exploring a revolutionary space telescope design with a long, narrow primary mirror instead of a traditional circular one. A 20×1 m rectangular mirror concentrates resolution along its length, enabling it to separate Earth-like planets from their stars at ~30 light-years in infrared light. Rotating the telescope 90° captures planets in all orbital orientations.
title: Astronomers Propose Rectangular Telescope to Hunt Earth-Like Planets

description: Apple has just labelled the iPhone 8 Plus as vintage on its vintage and obsolete products page. If you are still using the 64GB or 256GB storage variant of the iPhone 8 Plus, we’ve got some bad news. Users with this old smartphone will now have limited service and repair options. The 11-inch MacBook Air, 13-inch MacBook Pro, and 15-inch MacBook Pro have all been declared obsolete.
title: Apple's iPhone 8 Plus Listed as Vintage Product Ahead of iPhone 17 Launch, 11-Inch MacBook Air Now Obsolete

description: Paramount Pictures is said to be in negotiations to acquire film rights for Call of Duty. The movie studio has reportedly made the popular first-person shooter franchise a priority. No talent is yet attached to the potential project.
title: Call of Duty Film Adaption Said to Be a 'Priority' at Paramount, Negotiations on to Acquire Rights

description: Between Sept. 1–2, Earth will be struck by a powerful geomagnetic storm caused by a rare “cannibal” solar eruption. The event formed when a fast coronal mass ejection (CME) overtook and consumed an earlier one, creating a stronger, chaotic cloud. As this storm interacts with Earth’s magnetic field, it may produce vivid auroras visible far beyond their usual range.
title: Cannibal Solar Storm May Trigger Auroras as Powerful Geomagnetic Storm to Hit Earth Soon

description: Portugal has faced devastating earthquakes for centuries, including the 1755 Lisbon disaster. Scientists now link these events to oceanic plate delamination beneath the Horseshoe Abyssal Plain. This surprising discovery, published in Nature Geoscience, explains why quakes strike far from fault lines and improves future preparedness in Portugal and Spain.
title: Hidden Reason Behind Portugal’s Deadly Earthquakes Finally Explained

description: Microsoft's new “Access PC’s clipboard” feature has reportedly been spotted on a new Windows Dev build. This feature allows users to access their Windows clipboard content on their Android smartphone. Users are required to be logged in to their Microsoft account on both devices to use the feature, according to a report.
title: Microsoft Testing Native Clipboard Sync Feature to Share Text Between Windows PCs, Android Devices

description: Redmi 15 5G was launched in India on August 19 with a 7,000mAh battery and a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset. Redmi’s parent company has now announced a new sale event, dubbed Diwali With Xiaomi, which is currently live in India. As part of the sale, the smartphone maker has slashed the prices of several of its smartphones, including the latest Redmi 15 5G. Moreover, it is also offering a true wireless stereo (TWS) at a discounted price.
title: Redmi 15 5G, Redmi 14 Pro 5G Series Prices Dropped During Diwali With Xiaomi Sale

description: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless 80th Anniversary Edition was launched in India on Tuesday, celebrating "80 years of sound innovation" with a design created in collaboration with German graffiti artist Bond Truluv. The headphones feature yellow accents inspired by the classic HD 414 and carry the same specs as the 2022 model, including a 42mm transducer system, adaptive ANC with Transparency Mode, Bluetooth 5.2, and up to 60 hours of claimed battery life. Buyers can purchase them via Sennheiser India, Amazon, and Flipkart.
title: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless 80th Anniversary Edition Launched in India With Up to 60 Hour Battery Life

description: YouTube has reportedly started cracking down on Premium Family accounts where members live outside the plan manager’s household. Some users are said to be receiving warning emails stating their Premium access will be revoked within 14 days if location checks fail, though they will remain in the family group with ads unless verified. YouTube already runs 30-day location check-ins, but rarely enforces them. The move appears to be pushing users toward individual or two-member plans, similar to Netflix’s strategy.
title: YouTube Reportedly Cracks Down on Premium Family Plan Sharing With Location-Based Checks

description: The Jason Momoa starrer A Minecraft Movie, along with its blocky adventure, has caught the attention of the fans.  Based on a group of friends who team to fight evil and learn the weird and wonderful rules of the cubic world. The film will be available for streaming on JioHotstar from September 4.
title: A Minecraft Movie to Stream on JioHotstar Soon: What You Need to Know About This Gripping Fantasy Adventure Film Online

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will commence soon, as the company recently announced. Recently, the e-commerce platform also revealed that it will offer an instant 10 percent discount on SBI credit and debit cards. Moreover, the Prime members will have early access to the upcoming sale event. Last year, the Amazon sale started on September 27, nearly a month before Diwali. This year also Amazon is expected to follow a similar timeframe.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Deals and Discounts on Samsung Phones, Laptops, and More Teased

description: El Salvador will host Bitcoin Histórico, the world’s first government-backed Bitcoin conference, on November 12–13, in San Salvador. Organised by the National Bitcoin Office, the event will feature global leaders like Ricardo Salinas and Jeff Booth, with sessions on financial freedom, regulation, energy, and Bitcoin adoption. The conference follows El Salvador’s redistribution of 6,284 BTC across multiple wallets for enhanced security and transparency, signalling the nation’s commitment to Bitcoin as a strategic asset.
title: El Salvador to Host First Government-Backed Bitcoin Conference in November

description: Kannappa, written and acted by Vishnu Manchu, is a Telugu Devotional movie which explores themes of devotion, power, and Hinduism. After a mixed run at the box office, the film will soon be available for streaming on OTT platforms in India. Here's what you need to know.
title: Kannappa OTT Release Date is Here: When and Where to Watch Vishnu Manchu-Starrer Film Online

description: After two incidents where ChatGPT users committed suicide, OpenAI has now shared its plans to develop better safeguards and protective measures to protect users when they face a sensitive moment or are emotionally distressed. The company now plans to execute most of these measures within the next 120 days.
title: OpenAI Shares New Safeguard Plans to Protect Teenagers and Users Facing Emotional Distress

description: Razer isn't new to productivity work setups, as the brand in the past has experimented with productive use cases instead of the usual gaming accessories. The new Razer Pro Click V2 and Pro Click V2 Vertical want to establish the company in work or creative setups, while letting you play when you need to take a break.
title: Razer Pro Click V2 and V2 Vertical Review: Productivity Mice with Gaming Guts

description: Realme Watch 5 will likely feature a 1.97-inch AMOLED display and support Bluetooth calling, GPS, GNSS, NFC, as well as Bluetooth intercom. It is also expected to include a gaming mode, carry an IP68 rating, and pack a 460mAh battery that may last up to 14 days. Leaked images show black and silver variants. Realme will likely launch it globally, though its availability in India remains unclear.
title: Realme Watch 5 Design Leaked; Will Reportedly Feature 1.97-Inch AMOLED Screen

description: Samsung's much-awaited Galaxy Z TriFold will be launched on September 29. The Galaxy Unpacked event for Samsung's first triple-screen foldable phone will reportedly be held in Korea. Besides the regular  Galaxy Z TriFold, Samsung may also introduce the long-rumoured  Project Moohan XR headset and Galaxy Glasses at the event.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Launch Date Leaked; Said to Debut Alongside Project Moohan XR Headset

description: Union Minister of Communications, Jyotiraditya M. Scindia, said that India’s AI development needs to take a balanced regulatory approach. He highlighted that while the country cannot overlook focus areas such as safety, security, and inclusion, the policies should not hinder the development of the technology. He emphasised that India’s AI framework should be open and flexible.
title: India’s AI Development Needs a Balanced Regulatory Approach, Says Jyotiraditya Scindia

description: Realme is gearing up to launch a smartphone with a 10,000mAh battery, as per a company official. A similar handset was teased earlier this year, but it was a concept device. Realme Vice President Chase Xu has confirmed that a handset with similar battery specifications will enter mass production in early 2026, with a potential launch scheduled for the same year.
title: Realme’s 10,000mAh Battery Phone Teased to Enter Mass Production in Early 2026

description: SpaceX successfully launched 28 Starlink satellites into low Earth orbit on August 31, 2025, aboard a Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral. The deployment will be expanding Starlink’s growing constellation, now totaling more than 8,200 active satellites providing global internet coverage.
title: SpaceX Expands Starlink with 28 Satellites in Latest Falcon 9 Mission

description: IO Interactive has announced a gameplay deep dive for its upcoming James Bond game, 007 First Light. The developer will show off over 30 minutes of gameplay at a State of Play presentation on September 3. 007 First Light was revealed at Sony's State of Play broadcast in June.
title: 007 First Light Is Getting a Gameplay Deep Dive at Sony's State of Play This Week

description: Apple is reportedly pushing suppliers to switch to automation. The company now requires suppliers to bear full automation costs, with order volume incentives as the primary financial encouragement. The latest shift is part of a broader strategy to reduce reliance on manual labour and increase production efficiency. The move also supports Apple's efforts to diversify manufacturing beyond China.
title: Apple Reportedly Pushes Supply Chain Partners to Ramp Up Automation Upgrades

description: Hollywood is taking on Bitcoin’s biggest mystery with Killing Satoshi, a 2026 thriller starring Pete Davidson and Casey Affleck. Directed by Doug Liman, the film will dramatise the hunt for Satoshi Nakamoto, Bitcoin’s elusive creator, with a script by Nick Schenk. The story promises political intrigue, global power struggles, and echoes of The Social Network. For the crypto industry, the film could bring Bitcoin’s origins back into mainstream cultural conversation.
title: Bitcoin Conspiracy Thriller Killing Satoshi Starring Casey Affleck, Pete Davidson Expected to Release in 2026

description: The crypto market remains volatile as Bitcoin consolidates near $110,000 (roughly Rs. 96.8 lakh) with traders eyeing the $115,000 (roughly Rs. 1.01 crore) resistance. Ethereum trades near $4,300 (roughly Rs. 3.79 lakh), but reclaiming $4,600 (roughly Rs. 4.05 lakh) could shift sentiment positively. Altcoins such as Solana and Dogecoin are gaining traction, while XRP remains muted. Analysts highlight whale activity, institutional flows, and seasonal weakness as key drivers behind market moves.
title: Bitcoin Nears $110,000 as Whale Moves and ETF Flows Shape Market

description: Google has denied all claims of Gmail suffering a data breach or alerting 2.5 billion users about the same. On Monday, the Mountain View-based tech giant published a blog post and highlighted that any information around this information is “entirely false.” The company also urged outlets to ensure that conversation in this space is accurate and factual.
title: Google Debunks Gmail Security Warning Reports, Calls It Entirely False

description: Google Pixel 10 series was recently unveiled globally by the California-based tech giant. The lineup includes the standard Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Now, the company could be preparing to launch a more affordable model as part of the series, dubbed the Pixel 10a. The handset could be a successor to last year’s Pixel 9a, which debuted in India earlier this year. A leaker has revealed some specifications of the upcoming Google handset.
title: Google Pixel 10a Tipped to Debut Without Latest Tensor G5 Chip, Magic Cue Feature

description: HMD Pulse 2 Pro could launch soon. Ahead of the formal launch, the handset has surfaced on a retailer's website, revealing its price, design and specifications. The listing suggests a 6.7-inch display and a Unisoc T615 chipset on the phone. It is expected to come with a 5,000mAh battery and a 50-megapixel rear camera unit.
title: HMD Pulse 2 Pro Price, Specifications Leaked via Retail Website; Expected to Feature 6.7-Inch Display, 5,000mAh Battery

description: iQOO 15 launch timeline was recently leaked online, along with a few of its features. Now, a tipster has reportedly revealed more key specifications of the supposed successor of the iQOO 13. The handset is said to be powered by a soon-to-launch Snapdragon chip. The iQOO 13 was unveiled in China in October last year. The handset sports a 6.82-inch 2K OLED screen with up to 144Hz refresh rate and HDR support. It is powered by last year’s Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC.
title: iQOO 15 Tipped to Launch With a 7,000mAh+ Battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Chip

description: The Lenovo Legion Go 2 could reportedly cost over $1,000 in the US. In Europe, the handheld will reportedly be priced at EUR 999. The device is expected to be unveiled at IFA Berlin later this week, but a leak on Monday detailed its specifications and design.
title: Lenovo Legion Go 2's Price Tipped Ahead of Reveal, Could Be Costlier Than ROG Xbox Ally X

description: Motorola has announced a new special Brilliant Collection of the Razr 60 smartphone and Moto Buds Loop earbuds in India, studded with Swarovski crystals. They will go on sale in the country from September 11. This special  Swarovski Edition Razr 60 features 35 hand-set crystals. It comes with a crossbody case.
title: Motorola Razr 60, Moto Buds Loop Swarovski Edition Launched in India: Price, Availability

description: OnePlus 15 is expected to debut in China soon, while arriving in India in January next year. The phone could be a successor to the OnePlus 13, which featured a 50-megapixel triple-rear camera setup. Ahead of its supposed launch, a tipster has revealed that the OnePlus 15 will come with a proprietary image engine. The handset was recently spotted listed on a benchmarking website with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 SoC.
title: OnePlus 15 Will Reportedly Arrive With Company's New, Propreitary Camera Engine

description: Oppo launched the Enco Buds 3 Pro TWS earphones in India on August 11 alongside the K13 Turbo series. Priced at Rs. 1,799, they are available in Glaze White and Graphite Grey via Flipkart and the Oppo India website, with a limited discount reducing the price to Rs. 1,599 until September 4. The earbuds feature 12.4mm titanium-plated dynamic drivers, an IP55 rating, and are claimed to offer up to 54 hours of total playback with the charging case.
title: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro With 12.4mm Dynamic Drivers, IP55 Rating Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers

description: Oppo Find X9 is expected to succeed last year’s Find X8. Leaks regarding the phone’s specifications have been surfacing online for some time. Recent reports have suggested that the purported handset might carry a 50-megapixel primary rear camera, accompanied by a 50-megapixel ultrawide-angle lens, and a 50-megapixel periscope sensor. Now, an alleged render of the Oppo Find X9 has surfaced online, revealing the phone's design. It also suggests that the handset might come with a redesigned rear camera island.
title: Oppo Find X9 Design Spotted in Leaked Render; Performance Revealed via Geekbench [Updated]

description: Realme 15T has launched in India with a 7,000mAh battery, 60W SuperVOOC charging, and a MediaTek Dimensity 6400 Max SoC with up to 12GB RAM. It features a 50-megapixel dual rear camera, a 50-megapixel selfie camera with 4K video support, and a 6,050 sq mm VC cooling system. Its prices start at Rs. 20,999, going up to Rs. 24,999, and pre-orders are open, with sales beginning September 5 via Flipkart, the official website and retail stores.
title: Realme 15T Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Selfie Camera: Price, Specifications

description: At Semicon India 2025 on Tuesday, Union IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw showcased the 32-bit microprocessor ‘Vikram’. It is developed by ISRO and is India's first fully indigenous 32-bit microprocessor. As per ISRO, Vikram is designed for launch vehicle operations and can withstand harsh environmental conditions. As per Vaishnaw, two other fabrication plants will also release their chips in the coming months.
title: Semicon India 2025: India’s First Indigenous ‘Vikram’ 32-bit Microprocessor Showcased

description: The Trial Season 2 is soon landing on your digital screens. It features Kajol in the lead role. This season will follow Noyonika SenGupta battling with her professional and personal life altogether. However, the stakes are higher this time, as some faces from her past will create chaos.
title: The Trial Season 2 Streaming on OTT Soon: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: A spectacular total lunar eclipse, also called the Blood Moon, will occur on Sept. 7–8, 2025. Viewers in India, Europe, Africa, and Asia can enjoy the event, while the Americas will miss it. Totality lasts 82 minutes, with livestreams available for those with cloudy skies.
title: Total Lunar Eclipse 2025: When and Where to Watch the Blood Moon Safely

description: Vivo X300 series is in development and could be launched in the coming months. Now, a company official has revealed the upcoming Vivo X300 series handsets will use a new 200-megapixel camera sensor developed by Samsung. The Vivo X300 will use it as a main sensor, while the X300 Pro will use it as a telephoto unit. It is said to be an upgrade over Samsung's current ISOCELL HP9 sensor.
title: Vivo X300 Series to Use Samsung’s New 200-Megapixel ISOCELL HPB Sensor for Stills, Portrait Photography

description: WhatsApp is now letting users generate backgrounds during video calls via artificial intelligence (AI). The Meta-owned platform is adding a new feature that lets users type a prompt to generate their desired background for a video call. The company highlighted that the feature is powered by Meta AI. This is how you can use it.
title: WhatsApp Adds Meta AI-Powered Background Generation Feature for Video Calls

description: A group of researchers have published a paper in the Nature journal, highlighting the creation of a 6G chipset that can operate across a wide network spectrum between 0.5GHz and 115GHz. Capable of delivering more than 100Gbps mobile Internet speeds, the mobile platform was built on a new material dubbed thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN).
title: World’s First “All-Frequency” 6G Chipset Unveiled by Chinese Researchers

description: In today’s world, writing like a human is easier said than done. As the Internet fills up with AI-generated slop, predictable writing structure with repetitive sentences is getting shunned, and write-ups that focus on a personal voice and have nuance are being appreciated. So, whether you have to write an essay or a report, these tips will tell you how not to write like an AI.
title: How to Not Write Like AI: These Tips Will Make Your Writing Appear Human, Not Generated From ChatGPT

description: OpenAI, the company behind the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot ChatGPT, is reportedly planning to establish its first data centre in India. The report comes at a time when the company CEO, Sam Altman, has confirmed visiting the country later this month. Additionally, the AI firm will also be opening its first India office by the end of 2025.
title: OpenAI Reportedly Plans To Build Its First Data Centre in India With 1GW Capacity

description: WhatsApp is developing a new way for you to create and save stickers in your collection. Currently, users are required to send a sticker in an active chat in order to save it. However, the Meta-owned app is working on a new feature which lets you directly add a sticker as favourite or save it in a collection, offering a quicker sticker management avenue.
title: WhatsApp for Android Testing New Feature Which Lets You Create, Save Stickers Without Sending Them First

description: Xiaomi 15T with the model number 25069PTEBG has surfaced on Geekbench with a MediaTek Dimensity 8400 chipset, 12GB RAM, and Android 15. It is expected to be priced at EUR 649 (roughly Rs. 66,000) for 12GB+256GB variant and may support 67W charging. The Xiaomi 15T Pro could pack a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC, a 5,500mAh battery with 90W charging, an IP69 rating, a flat OLED display, and a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit.
title: Xiaomi 15T Arrives on Geekbench With MediaTek Dimensity 8400 SoC, 12GB RAM

description: Vivo Y500 has been launched in China. The handset comes with a 120Hz AMOLED screen. It is powerd by a Dimensity 7300 SoC, paired with 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. The main highlight of the Vivo Y500 is its mammoth 8,200mAh battery that supports 90W fast charging. It also becomes Vivo’s first smartphone to debut with an IP69+ rating for durability.
title: Vivo Y500 Launched With 120Hz AMOLED Screen and 8,200mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Realme 15T 5G will be launched in India today, September 2. It will arrive as the successor to the Realme 14T 5G and the latest addition to the Realme 15 series. In the days leading up to the launch, the company has been teasing several details about the handset. From price in India to specifications, here is everything you need to know about the Realme 15T 5G ahead of its launch today.
title: Realme 15T 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
